description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fixed an issue where the delete button might crash during rapid clicking in the auto-install process.  
2. Added version 1.21.7 to the version filter criteria on the download interface.  
3. Updated mod translation information.  
4. Use foreground services to run Forge/NeoForge/Optifine-related installation tasks, fixing the issue where installation might fail on some devices.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复快速点击自动安装中的删除按键可能崩溃的问题
2.下载界面版本过滤条件增加1.21.7版本
3.更新模组翻译信息
4.使用前台服务运行forge/neoforge/optifine相关安装任务，修复部分设备上无法正常安装的问题
